RED3310 - Early Reading, Writing and Lan.name: RED3310 - Early Reading, Writing and Language Arts

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: Admission to the Early Childhood Program, EEC 3700, EEC 4661, EEC 4268 and gpa 2.75 or Instructor Consent

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Emergent reading/writing processes during preschool, kindergarten, and first grade; methods for implementing integrated language arts curriculum; guiding developmental early childhood language experiences.

College.title: College
College.text: College of Community Innovation and Education

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: EDF 2005, admission to the Elementary Education B.S. - Pending, Elementary Education B.S - Education Track, Elementary Education B.S.- K-6 Certification track, Elementary Education B. S.- Professional Studies track, Elementary Education B.S. - Lifelong Learning Track, Exceptional Education B.S.- pending, Exceptional Education B.S., Exceptional Education B.S.-Lifelong Learning track, Early Childhood Development and Education, Track 1: Education, Pre-Kindergarten - Primary (PK-3) (B.S.) or C.I.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Principles, procedures, and current practices for teaching reading. Specific techniques and materials for word identification, content reading and comprehension.

College.title: College
College.text: College of Community Innovation and Education

RED4519 - Diagnostic and Corrective Read.name: RED4519 - Diagnostic and Corrective Reading Strategies

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: An investigation of the needs of individual learners in reading instruction. Organization and techniques for promoting optimum reading growth. Concurrent school experiences required.

College.title: College
College.text: College of Community Innovation and Education

RED4043 - Content Reading in Kindergarte.name: RED4043 - Content Reading in Kindergarten through Grade 12

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Admission to the teacher education program. Content literacy in the K-12 school curriculum; Principles, strategies, assessment, and promising practices.

College.title: College
College.text: College of Community Innovation and Education

RED4311 - Primary Reading, Writing, and.name: RED4311 - Primary Reading, Writing, and Language Arts Curriculum and Assessment

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: (EEC 4604, EEC 4207, EEX 3450, RED 3012, and TSL 4240), and senior standing

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Methodologies for teaching and assessing young children in reading, writing, and language arts in the elementary grades.

College.title: College
College.text: College of Community Innovation and Education

RED4942 - Practicum for Assessment and I.name: RED4942 - Practicum for Assessment and Instruction of Reading

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: RED 3012, RED 4519, and admission to  Elementary Education B.S. - Education Track or Exceptional Student Education B.S.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Practicum that provides opportunity to apply knowledge of reading assessment and instruction in order to increase reading proficiency of struggling readers. Concurrent school experience required.

College.title: College
College.text: College of Community Innovation and Education
